home.title: e-Likita Hospital Consultation Assistant
home.subtitle: Healthcare Assistant Guided Triage
home.description: This guided consultation will help assess your symptoms and provide appropriate healthcare recommendations.
home.disclaimer: This tool is for guidance only and does not replace professional medical advice. In case of emergency, call emergency services immediately.

privacySection.title: Your Privacy Matters
privacySection.description: Data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Only authorized healthcare professionals can access your medical records.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your data is protected with military-grade encryption

hipaa.title: HIPAA Compliant
hipaa.description: Meets healthcare privacy and security standards

consultations.title: Consultation History
consultations.subtitle: View and manage your previous medical consultations
consultations.signInToView: Please sign in to view your consultation history.
consultations.noConsultationsDescription: You haven't completed any consultations yet. Start your first consultation to see it here.

intro.title: Welcome to e-Likita Consultation
intro.subtitle: Let's get started with your medical consultation
intro.description: This guided consultation will help assess your symptoms and provide appropriate healthcare recommendations. The process takes about 5-10 minutes.
intro.disclaimer: This tool is for guidance only and does not replace professional medical advice. In case of emergency, call emergency services immediately.

whatToExpect.title: What to Expect:
whatToExpect.guidedProcessDesc: We'll walk you through each step to gather comprehensive information about your health.
whatToExpect.symptomAssessmentDesc: Advanced assessment tools to understand your symptoms and potential risks.
whatToExpect.personalizedRecommendationsDesc: Tailored advice based on your specific symptoms and medical history.
whatToExpect.printableSummaryDesc: Complete consultation summary you can save or share with your healthcare provider.

patientInfo.title: Patient Information
patientInfo.subtitle: Tell us about yourself
patientInfo.description: Please provide your basic information and medical history to help us provide better recommendations.

symptoms.title: Symptom Assessment
symptoms.subtitle: Describe your symptoms
symptoms.description: Please select the symptoms you're experiencing and rate their severity.
symptoms.noSymptomsSelected: Please select at least one symptom to continue.

followups.title: Follow-up Questions
followups.subtitle: Additional information needed
followups.description: Based on your symptoms, we have some additional questions to help provide better recommendations.
followups.noQuestions: No additional questions needed at this time.

summary.title: Consultation Summary
summary.subtitle: Review your consultation
summary.description: Please review your consultation details and recommendations.
summary.thankYou: Thank you for completing your consultation.
summary.importantNoticeText: This consultation is for guidance only and does not replace professional medical advice.
summary.urgentMedicalText: Based on your symptoms, you should seek immediate medical attention. Please visit the emergency department or call emergency services.
summary.name: Name
